Dear  I'm trying to use Maybank Platinum Visa pay my income tax payment through Cardup  1st time. However  it will only charge my card on Aug. 2nd. Is there any method I can pay my tax within July to meet minimum spend requirements for Maybank Platinum Visa? Thanks.
Wouldn't the GIRO deduction take place already by now? For Jul.And 2 Aug may not be in time for Aug tax payment also.
Other than CardUp  what is the other platform name?
Thanks  my main point is to spend the money to meet min spend requirements on CC. no matter it will be in on time for Aug tax or not.
You might want to spend elsewhere already. In especially merchants that are able to do same-day/one day posting.
I didn't aware that CardUp only charge my card so late. Thought the payment will be charged in July. Haiz
Can I use Ipaymy for income tax?
Arent u set the date for payment on the app?
Yeah  the earlist for my card to be charged is on Aug. 2nd.
Because he's trying to be JIT warrior. CardUp only allows setting up in the middle of the month.
U can set it to be earlier isnt it
that is the earliest date available. the earliest for IRAS to receive the payment is Aug. 7th...
this is my 1st time make payment on Cardup and didn't aware such policy
U can pay earlier by setting it in jul  look like u have not follow what other are discussing about tex payment on cardup. So next time do more research
You can try. Not sure if they block out the first week like CardUp or not  but the fees are a lot higher.
CardUp won't let you send on last week or first week of the month for tax payments.
Yeah  learned lesson 1st time and will do it mid of each month.
100k OCBC 360 account + 100k HSBC EGA150k UOB One account + 50k HSBC EGAIf you are new to any other banks  check out their promos.
Like he mentioned  the earliest is 7 Aug  and the charge is only done on 2 Aug.
To be safe  just set up the remaining monthsnow.Spend the required amount you need at merchants that posts within 1 day.Search the chat for dp of such merchants.

âš ï¸Trying to apply HSBC TravelOne cc for iPad 10th gen reward. Does this mean have to spend 1k in 2 months?"Apply for the HSBC TravelOne Credit Card  provide your marketing consent to HSBC  pay the annual fee (S$196.20 incl. GST) and make a min. spend of S$1 000 by the end of the following month from card approval date to be eligible for reward"
Just wanted to see if anyone else kena fraudulent transactions recently with cards linked/used with ipaymy
Yes. Within 2 months must spend $1k (excluding annual fee and it's GST)  pay annual fee and provide marketing consent.
Then it has nothing to do with ipaymy. It's just a common issue with Citibank cards due to bin dumping. Just report fraudulent transaction  get new card  move on.
